name: Elemental Stones
description: The four Elemental Stones hold the power to
balance the forces of nature in the world.
Seek out these ancient artifacts and harness
their power to restore harmony to the land.

objectives.find_fire_stone: Find the Fire Stone in the Volcano
objectives.find_water_stone: Find the Water Stone in the Deep Ocean
objectives.find_earth_stone: Find the Earth Stone in the Mountain Cave
objectives.find_air_stone: Find the Air Stone in the Sky Temple

dialogs.start1: The Elemental Stones have been scattered across the realm, hero.
dialogs.start2: Each stone is guarded by a powerful elemental guardian.
dialogs.start3: You must prove your worth to each guardian to claim their stone.
dialogs.progress1: You have shown mastery over the elemental forces.
dialogs.progress2: Continue your quest, for balance must be restored.
dialogs.complete1: All four Elemental Stones are now in your possession!
dialogs.complete2: The power of the elements flows through you, bringing harmony to the world.
